cn.trackName: 无尽坦克大战 - 八位元单机王者 完美模拟穿越旧经典电视手游
cn.description:
经典到不能再经典的小霸王红白机坦克, 小时候发梦也在玩. 在2012年我们为了延续儿时回忆, 开发了超级坦克大战, 很多人到现在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因为我们提供了500张地图. 天天玩, 玩了多年也还未玩完.

由于游戏引擎老化问题, 我们很难在超级坦克大战的基础上加入新功能. 所以我们决定开发新的坦克大战, "无尽坦克大战", 延续经典回忆.

作为经典的延续无尽坦克大战, 包含了所有经典元素, 改良了的新特点.
保证你可以玩到下一个十年.

游戏重点:
- 防御你的基地
- 摧毁所有敌方坦克
- 加入超级坦克大战500张传奇地图

无尽坦克大战, 是个跨平台游戏, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的踪影.
游戏会不定期更新, 目标是1000张地图.
cn.trackCensoredName: 无尽坦克大战 - 八位元单机王者 完美模拟穿越旧经典电视手游

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的成人或性暗示题材
cn.description:
All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides.

- Interactive Maps
- Sort and Filter
- Event Timers and Notifications
- Guides for Quests

Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content

Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord.


Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. 

apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

hk.description:
在台湾和日本鐵路線上駕駛電車並載客。

・簡單的益智遊戲
“東京電車２”是一款規則簡單的益智遊戲。無需專業知識。
火車迷，遊戲迷，人人都能享受。

・致所有將成為行動調度員的人
在日本的早晨，顧客們正在等待火車的到來去上班。
讓我們啟動火車並運送客戶。

- 遊戲目標
日本鐵路公司是營利性組織。讓我們以高營業利潤為目標吧！

・如何產生利潤
票價收入-出發成本=營業利潤。

票價收入是在車站的顧客登上火車時產生的。
示例）如果兩名乘客在票價為 20 的車站上車，他們將獲得 40。

發車費按發車時的車廂數收取。
示例）2 節車廂的火車為 30，4 節車廂的火車為 40，10 節車廂的火車為 70。


一個人可以乘坐一輛車。
票價收入是在乘客登上火車時產生的。
調整行駛距離和車輛數量以獲得最大利潤。
離境費用。如果你開的火車太多，而佔用率下降，你就會損失收入。

·操作方法
控制非常簡單，規則也很簡單。
你所要做的就是調整列車的車廂數量，讓列車在最佳時間出發。
隨著遊戲的進行，將會出現各種變化，例如特快列車和換乘站。

·體積
享受 50 多條路線。
請體驗日本鐵路公司的各種運輸策略。

- 沒有廣告，沒有計費
沒有應用內購買。無廣告。
請專心玩遊戲。孩子們可以安心地玩耍。
讓我們分享在 社交媒體 上駕駛的結果。

・鐵路玩
JR東日本、JR東海、JR西日本、JR九州、東武、東急、西武、京王、京急、京阪、阪急、阪神、近鐵、名鐵、小田急、南海、西鐵、相鐵、京成、東京地鐵、大阪地鐵、都營地鐵, 筑波快遞

・容量約130MB
存儲負擔也小。根本沒有繁重的處理。

hk.trackName: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊
hk.description:
經典到不能再經典的紅白機坦克, 小時候發夢也在玩. 在2012年我們為了延續兒時回憶, 開發了超級坦克大戰, 很多人到現在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因為我們提供了500張地圖. 天天玩, 玩了多年也還未玩完.

由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 

作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點.
保證你可以玩到下一個十年.

遊戲重點:
- 防禦你的基地
- 摧毀所有敵方坦克
- 加入超級坦克大戰500張傳奇地圖

無盡坦克大戰, 是個跨平台遊戲, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的蹤影.
遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.
hk.trackCensoredName: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊

hk.releaseNotes: 已經適配繁體字等14種語言
hk.description:
用你的原創創意打造只屬於你的城鎮開發SLG！
居民們可能會結婚，也會藉由股票交易獲得分紅。

開拓沒多久的島上，搬來了第一位居民
他的住處附近有想要什麼呢！？
餐廳和便利商店，還有服飾店跟家電量販店……
以最想居住的城鎮No.1為目標，陸續打造店家吧！

隨著城鎮發展，也會產生人氣鼎盛的排隊名店！
更有可能會迎接新居民的到來。

建造遊樂場會讓居民之間發展出戀情！？
從結婚到孩子出生……見證世世代代都居住於這個城鎮的光景吧。

種類豐富又令人興奮的交通工具登場！除了自行車與摩托車、汽車
更有飛機與熱氣球！？連UFO都有可能出現。
為躍躍欲試全部都想搭搭看的居民加油吧。

望向房屋一看，發現也有開始飼養寵物的居民！
貓與狗……大象與長頸鹿，連獅子也能飼養！？

進一步開拓島嶼就可以填海造陸，
讓地形產生高低差，也搭載了可自訂創造地形的模式

以成為世界上最令人憧憬的超巨大城市來進行開拓吧！

輕觸、拖曳、放大與縮小等操作方式皆可對應。

更多遊戲請搜尋「Kairosoft」。https://kairopark.jp
這裡有許多您可能玩過的免費遊戲，也有大量買斷制應用程式！
都是2D點陣圖風格的Kairosoft系列遊戲喔。

請跟隨我們的X (Twitter)，以獲得最新資訊。
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的現實生活暴力
hk.releaseNotes:
The shadows over Hue County grow darker in the wake of a shocking murder.

Step into the elegant Noir Mansion and interrogate six suspects too sharp for their own good. They'll point fingers in every direction and offer up promises of honesty. 

But you know better. Trust nothing but your clue sheet...

Could it have been Crime Reporter Scarlett with the Mini Revolver? Maybe Private Detective Mustard used the "Civil War" Musket with Bayonet? Did Risk Analyst Plum turn himself into a liability with the Billiard Stick, or perhaps Lawyer Peacock cracked with the Meat Tenderiser. Did Signature Forger White sign off Boddy's death with the Silver Candelabra? Or maybe Con Artist Green phoned in a deadly performance with the Rotary Phone... 

With the Noir Mansion crime scene, you can toggle the special Noir filter at any time during your game! See the mansion in its full-colour glory, or drench it in deep, cinematic shadows. 

You'll also unlock Noir-themed cosmetics to dress up in true vintage style!

INCLUDES:
- A BRAND-NEW CRIME SCENE – The highly requested film-noir theme arrives in Clue/Cluedo!
- THEMED COSMETICS – This crime scene includes a new player avatar, a different card back, a themed clue sheet, a sleek dice set and 12 new tokens.
- MORE STORY TO EXPLORE – Delve into the murky backstories of each suspect and uncover their motives.
hk.description:
Join fellow detectives all over the world in the official digital board game version of Clue/Cluedo! Gather crucial evidence, interrogate suspects and solve the original murder mystery.

Follow Miss Scarlett, Colonel Mustard, Professor Plum, Chef White, Solicitor Peacock and Mayor Green through the iconic Tudor Mansion, unlocking their motives and alibis as you go. 

Enjoy Clue/Cluedo the way you remember it in Classic Mode, or jump in for a quick game with Clue Cards mode. Alternatively, if you want to really test your sleuthing skills, try a new investigation format available exclusively to Clue/Cluedo – Ultimate Detective.

In Ultimate Detective Mode, everyone answers suggestions at the same time…but secretly! 

Face your suspects in a direct interrogation as you rely on your skills of deduction to get to the truth. Experience the mystery, solve the murder and become a top-tier detective!

HOW TO PLAY CLUE/CLUEDO: 

1. Three cards are dealt face-down and set aside – this is the solution to the crime!
2. Everyone is dealt three Clue Cards. These are automatically crossed off your clue sheet, as they can’t be part of the solution. 
3. Roll the dice and move around the board. 
4. When you enter a room, you can make a suggestion – select who you think the murderer is, what weapon they used and where the crime happened. 
5. Other players will then aim to disprove your suggestion; if one of your suggestions matches a card in their hand, they show you that card to disprove it. 
6. Use your clue sheet to keep track of which characters, weapons and rooms have been disproven. 
7. Think you’ve figured it out? It’s time to make an accusation! Be careful though – if you’re right, you win, but if you are wrong, you’re out! 

FEATURES

- THE CLASSIC TUDOR MANSION – Play the beloved original board game, now rendered in stunning 3D animation and entirely ad-free! 
- A BRAND-NEW GAME MODE – Exclusive to the digital version of Clue/Cluedo, Ultimate Detective Mode lets you interrogate multiple characters at once.
- MULTIPLE MODES – Compete against cutting-edge AI opponents that adapt to your skill level for the perfect game, or challenge detectives around the world. 
- ADDITIONAL ORIGINAL CONTENT – What happened after the shocking events of Tudor Mansion? Find out in a series of original new crime scenes designed specifically for the digital version of Clue/Cluedo! New characters emerge, bringing with them new clues, motives and case files to consider as you travel around the world in search of the truth. 

Sharpen your mind with the iconic murder-mystery board game, now available on mobile!

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的成人或性暗示題材
偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
偶爾/輕度的恐怖或驚嚇題材
mo.releaseNotes:
Features:
- Added the option to choose a server when starting a game. This can help if you experience connection or lag issues

Bug fixes:
- Improved stability on certain devices
mo.description:
SOLVE A CRYPTIC BOX
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is the first standalone chapter to the cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series 'Cryptic Killer'. Join forces with a friend and play as detective partners Ally and Old Dog in our debut two-player escape room adventure.



IMPORTANT: "Unboxing the Cryptic Killer" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game, that requires each player to have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our Discord community!



Two seasoned detectives, Ally and Old Dog, are entangled in a chilling unsolved case. Lured on a perilous trail, they fall into the clutches of the enigmatic Cryptic Killer they've been relentlessly pursuing. The stakes are sky-high as two innocent lives hang in the balance. In order to save them, Ally and Old Dog must unravel a box of intricate puzzles masterfully designed by the nefarious killer. Test your mettle and join this high-stakes race against time, where every puzzle solved is a step closer to unmasking the Cryptic Killer.



THE ONLY WAY TO ESCAPE IS TO WORK TOGETHER
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is a puzzle for exactly two players. The name of the game is collaboration. Each player takes on one of the two roles and works their way through a series of challenging puzzles. You'll each see one half of the same puzzle and must work together to crack the codes and escape the Cryptic Killer's clutches.



FEATURES LIST
▶Two Player Co-Op 
In Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, the detectives are separated. You’ll see different items and clues than your partner, and will be tested on your communication!
▶Challenging Collaborative Puzzles
Two brains are better than one when it comes to cracking the Cryptic Killer's codes.
▶Unravel a Thrilling Story
Track the Cryptic Killer's movements as Detectives Old Dog and Ally in this ongoing murder mystery saga.
▶Explore Illustrated Worlds
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer features hand-illustrated environments that are inspired by noir novels.
▶Draw on… Everything!
You cannot solve a case without taking notes. At any time in the game, you can whip out a notebook and pen to make notes and scribble on your environment.

mo.trackCensoredName: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊
mo.trackName: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes:
- 於青春果實和銀幣礦山任務新增快速掃蕩功能。
- 調整了怪獸平衡, 並準備新的怪獸與技能。
- 修復了各種錯誤。
tw.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

官方臉書:
https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/
官方論壇(英文):
http://www.neomonstersforum.com/
官方客服郵箱:
neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net

服務條款:
https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/
隱私政策:
https://www.zigzagame.com/Privacy-Policy/

advisories: 偶而/輕微的成人/性暗示題材

tw.trackName: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊
tw.description:
經典到不能再經典的紅白機坦克, 小時候發夢也在玩. 在2012年我們為了延續兒時回憶, 開發了超級坦克大戰, 很多人到現在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因為我們提供了500張地圖. 天天玩, 玩了多年也還未玩完.

由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 

作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點.
保證你可以玩到下一個十年.

遊戲重點:
- 防禦你的基地
- 摧毀所有敵方坦克
- 加入超級坦克大戰500張傳奇地圖

無盡坦克大戰, 是個跨平台遊戲, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的蹤影.
遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.
tw.trackCensoredName: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊

tw.releaseNotes: 已經適配繁體字等14種語言
tw.description:
用你的原創創意打造只屬於你的城鎮開發SLG！
居民們可能會結婚，也會藉由股票交易獲得分紅。

開拓沒多久的島上，搬來了第一位居民
他的住處附近有想要什麼呢！？
餐廳和便利商店，還有服飾店跟家電量販店……
以最想居住的城鎮No.1為目標，陸續打造店家吧！

隨著城鎮發展，也會產生人氣鼎盛的排隊名店！
更有可能會迎接新居民的到來。

建造遊樂場會讓居民之間發展出戀情！？
從結婚到孩子出生……見證世世代代都居住於這個城鎮的光景吧。

種類豐富又令人興奮的交通工具登場！除了自行車與摩托車、汽車
更有飛機與熱氣球！？連UFO都有可能出現。
為躍躍欲試全部都想搭搭看的居民加油吧。

望向房屋一看，發現也有開始飼養寵物的居民！
貓與狗……大象與長頸鹿，連獅子也能飼養！？

進一步開拓島嶼就可以填海造陸，
讓地形產生高低差，也搭載了可自訂創造地形的模式

以成為世界上最令人憧憬的超巨大城市來進行開拓吧！

輕觸、拖曳、放大與縮小等操作方式皆可對應。

更多遊戲請搜尋「Kairosoft」。https://kairopark.jp
這裡有許多您可能玩過的免費遊戲，也有大量買斷制應用程式！
都是2D點陣圖風格的Kairosoft系列遊戲喔。

請跟隨我們的X (Twitter)，以獲得最新資訊。
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
us.releaseNotes:
Features:
- Added the option to choose a server when starting a game. This can help if you experience connection or lag issues

Bug fixes:
- Improved stability on certain devices
us.description:
SOLVE A CRYPTIC BOX
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is the first standalone chapter to the cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series 'Cryptic Killer'. Join forces with a friend and play as detective partners Ally and Old Dog in our debut two-player escape room adventure.



IMPORTANT: "Unboxing the Cryptic Killer" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game, that requires each player to have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our Discord community!



Two seasoned detectives, Ally and Old Dog, are entangled in a chilling unsolved case. Lured on a perilous trail, they fall into the clutches of the enigmatic Cryptic Killer they've been relentlessly pursuing. The stakes are sky-high as two innocent lives hang in the balance. In order to save them, Ally and Old Dog must unravel a box of intricate puzzles masterfully designed by the nefarious killer. Test your mettle and join this high-stakes race against time, where every puzzle solved is a step closer to unmasking the Cryptic Killer.



THE ONLY WAY TO ESCAPE IS TO WORK TOGETHER
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is a puzzle for exactly two players. The name of the game is collaboration. Each player takes on one of the two roles and works their way through a series of challenging puzzles. You'll each see one half of the same puzzle and must work together to crack the codes and escape the Cryptic Killer's clutches.



FEATURES LIST
▶Two Player Co-Op 
In Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, the detectives are separated. You’ll see different items and clues than your partner, and will be tested on your communication!
▶Challenging Collaborative Puzzles
Two brains are better than one when it comes to cracking the Cryptic Killer's codes.
▶Unravel a Thrilling Story
Track the Cryptic Killer's movements as Detectives Old Dog and Ally in this ongoing murder mystery saga.
▶Explore Illustrated Worlds
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer features hand-illustrated environments that are inspired by noir novels.
▶Draw on… Everything!
You cannot solve a case without taking notes. At any time in the game, you can whip out a notebook and pen to make notes and scribble on your environment.

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day.

Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle".

Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements.

Core Game Rule:
- Defence your base
- Destroy all enemy tanks

Key Features:
- Different type of enemy
- Different type of Map style
- Special items
- Auto Helper tank
- Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps

Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

Give free reign to your creativity in this inventive town sim!

Unlock new stores and facilities, help your residents find love, or cash in on the stock market!

If you founded a new town on an uninhabited island, what would you build there? Restaurants? Convenience Stores? Movie theaters? Make your choices and create a town that everyone will want to move to!

As you develop your town further, you'll unlock new stores and facilities, helping you attract new citizens.

Residents of your town can spend their whole lives there - they can find jobs, get married, and even have kids. How many generations can you support?

Walking isn't the only way to get around town - residents can travel in style using cars, bikes, and even UFOs!

There's also a wide variety of pets available, including staples like cats and dogs as well as more out-there options. Ever wanted an elephant in your backyard? We've got you covered.

No space to build more stuff? No problem! Reclaim land off the coast, then customize the terrain's height and design it to create a region that perfectly fits your tastes!

Get started building the city of your dreams today!

Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom.

Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kairopark.jp
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues!

Follow us on X (Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information.
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

tr.releaseNotes:
Fixed an error with the song Aleph-0
Fixed an issue where Dextroy and some badges were incorrectly locked
tr.description:
Rotaeno is a heart-pounding, thumb-tapping, wrist-flicking rhythm game that fully utilizes your device's gyroscope for an unprecedented musical experience.
Rotate your device to hit notes as you soar through the stars. Drop into your headphones and immerse yourself in the kick beats and stellar synths of this astronautical adventure!

=A Revolutionary Way to Experience Music=
What sets Rotaeno apart is all in the name - rotation! Building on the basic controls of more traditional rhythm games, Rotaeno includes notes that require smooth turns and rapid rotations to hit, making it feel like you're drifting in a highspeed interstellar stunt race. It's a real arcade experience - in the palm of your hand!

=Multi Genre Music and Beats=
Rotaeno is loaded with exclusive tracks from renowned rhythm game composers. From EDM to JPOP, KPOP to Opera, the stylistically diverse song collection contains a future favorite song for every music lover! More songs are already planned for future updates and will be released on a regular basis.

=A Journey to Find the Promised Land, Love, and Ourselves=
Follow Ilot, our heroine, on a cosmic journey through the stars, and witness her growth as she sets out on her own. Follow in the footsteps of a friend, meet locals on different planets, and save the future of Aquaria!

*Rotaeno will only function properly on devices that feature gyroscope or accelerometer support.
Concerns or feedback? Contact us: rotaeno@xd.com

Give free reign to your creativity in this inventive town sim!

Unlock new stores and facilities, help your residents find love, or cash in on the stock market!

If you founded a new town on an uninhabited island, what would you build there? Restaurants? Convenience Stores? Movie theaters? Make your choices and create a town that everyone will want to move to!

As you develop your town further, you'll unlock new stores and facilities, helping you attract new citizens.

Residents of your town can spend their whole lives there - they can find jobs, get married, and even have kids. How many generations can you support?

Walking isn't the only way to get around town - residents can travel in style using cars, bikes, and even UFOs!

There's also a wide variety of pets available, including staples like cats and dogs as well as more out-there options. Ever wanted an elephant in your backyard? We've got you covered.

No space to build more stuff? No problem! Reclaim land off the coast, then customize the terrain's height and design it to create a region that perfectly fits your tastes!

Get started building the city of your dreams today!

Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom.

Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at http://kairopark.jp
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues!

Follow us on X (Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information.
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

pt.releaseNotes: Agora disponível em Português e 14 outros idiomas.
pt.description:
Deixe a criatividade correr solta nesse simulador de vila!

Desbloqueie novas lojas e instalações, ajude os habitantes a encontrar o amor ou fature no mercado de ações!

Se você fundasse uma nova vila numa ilha inabitada, o que você construiria lá? Restaurantes? Lojas de conveniência? Cinemas? Tome suas decisões e crie uma vila onde todos vão querer morar!

Conforme você desenvolver a vila, vai desbloquear novas lojas e instalações que ajudarão a atrair mais cidadãos.

Habitantes da sua vila podem passar a vida inteira por lá — arrumar emprego, casar e até ter filhos. Quantas gerações você vai amparar?

A caminhada não é o único jeito de circular pela vila — os habitantes podem se locomover com estilo de carro, de bicicleta e até em OVNIs!

Também há uma grande variedade de bichos de estimação, incluindo os clássicos como gatos e cachorros, além de opções mais exóticas. Já quis ter um elefante no quintal? Conta com a gente.

Acabou o espaço para construir mais coisas? Sem problema! Faça um aterro no litoral e então personalize a altura do terreno e crie uma região perfeitamente de acordo com o seu gosto!

Comece a construir a cidade dos seus sonhos hoje mesmo!

Arraste para mover o mapa e junte os dedos para zoom.

Busque "Kairosoft" para ver todos os nossos jogos, ou nos visite em http://kairopark.jp
Não se esqueça de dar uma olhada nos jogos pagos e grátis!
A série de jogos pixelados da Kairosoft continua!

Siga a gente no X (Twitter) para receber as novidades e informações da Kairosoft.
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010
